column9: 1?? Performance varies significantly by call center
Some call centers consistently show higher average CSAT, regardless of channel.
Others show lower CSAT with high ticket volumes, indicating operational issues.
“Customer experience quality is not uniform across call centers.”
Call centers handling more tickets do not always deliver better CSAT.
In some cases, high volume correlates with lower satisfaction.
“Load balancing and staffing quality matter more than sheer volume.”
Certain channels (e.g., Call-Center vs Chat) perform differently across the same call center.
“Training and workflows should be customized per channel.”
“Fixing a few underperforming centers can significantly lift overall CSAT.”
